SEARCH
Package com.fortisbank.ui.ui_utils

Class StyleUtils

java.lang.Object
com.fortisbank.ui.ui_utils.StyleUtils
public class StyleUtils extends Object
Centralized styling utility for FortisBank dark-themed UI. Includes color palette, font definitions, and styling helpers. Modular design for reuse across panels, forms, dialogs, and buttons.
